localize.text: Did you know there’s a cactus on your chaotic mess of a desk?
It seems that an employee who wanted to become intimate with you put it there.
If I were to give my personal input, I don’t like cacti much.
There could be various reasons for one to grow a plant.
However, its vicious thorns are not something worth enduring like those of a rose, as it is not pleasing to the sight. Nor does it produce valuable sap like a maple tree.
I’ve also never seen one grow a flower bud.
Theoretically, it would bloom in the right environment.
That possibility is something I’ve never witnessed, as it may be that all cacti I have known spread their roots into barren soil.
Do you believe the cactus will bear a flower?
You talk as if you’ve seen it for yourself.
Well, if you’re so certain about it, then keep it.
This place doesn’t even have sunlight, but who am I to stop you?
Why do you still keep it on your desk, then?
Do you think it rude to get rid of something you’ve received as a gift?
Be careful, it could prick you when you reach for other things strewn about your disordered desk.
